column2: ConeBeam CT - low dose 3D scan of the teeth
Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry - bone density test
Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine - file format of radiology images (similar to how a photo can be a JPEG or PNG)
Distal Interphalangeal Joints (finger or toe joints)
Ultrasound technique used to visualise blood flow
Deep Vein Thrombosis (blood clot in limb)
estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate - kidney function blood test
A blood vessel or mass that has ruptured and is bleeding
Metacarpal Phalangeal Joints (where the fingers connect to the hand)
Metatarsal Phalangeal Joints (where the toes connect to the foot)
Motor Vehicle Accident / Motor Bike Accident
Hidden fracture that is not originally seen on a scan (usually x-ray)
Orthopantomogram - Panoramic x-ray of the teeth
Picture Archiving and Communication System - software used to store, share and view radiology images
Pulmonary Embolus (blood clot in the lungs)
Positron Emission Tomography (a nuclear medicine test)
Proximal Interphalangeal Joints (finger or toe joints)
Red Blood Cells / Red Blood Count
